engine-mysql-use-innodb.title: Use Innodb
engine-mysql-use-innodb.description: Require InnoDB as the storage engine for MySQL.

table-require-pk.title: Require primary key
table-require-pk.description: Require the table to have a primary key.

table-no-foreign-key.title: No foreign key
table-no-foreign-key.description: Disallow the foreign key in the table.

table-drop-naming-convention.title: Drop table with naming convention
table-drop-naming-convention.description: Only tables named with specific patterns can be deleted. The requires users to do a rename before dropping the table. The table name must have "_del" suffix by default.

naming-table.title: Table naming check
naming-table.description: Enforce the table name format and length limit. Default snake_lower_case with 64 characters.

naming-column.title: Column naming check
naming-column.description: Enforce the column name format and length limit. Default snake_lower_case with 64 characters.

naming-index-uk.title: Unique key naming check
naming-index-uk.description: Enforce the unique key name format and length limit. Default uk_<table_name>_<column_list> with 64 characters.

naming-index-pk.title: Primary key naming check
naming-index-pk.description: Enforce the primary key name format and length limit. Default pk_<table_name>_<column_list>.

naming-index-fk.title: Foreign key naming check
naming-index-fk.description: Enforce the foreign key name format and length limit. Default fk_<referencing_table>_<referencing_column>_<referenced_table>_<referenced_column> with 64 characters.

naming-index-idx.title: Index naming check
naming-index-idx.description: Enforce the index name format and length limit. Default idx_<table_name>_<column_list> with 64 characters.

column-required.title: Required columns
column-required.description: Enforce the required columns in each table.

statement-where-no-leading-wildcard-like.title: Disallow leading wildcard like
statement-where-no-leading-wildcard-like.description: Disallow leading '%' in LIKE, e.g. LIKE foo = '%x' is not allowed.

schema-backward-compatibility.title: Backward compatibility
schema-backward-compatibility.description: MySQL and TiDB support checking whether the schema change is backward compatible.

database-drop-empty-database.title: Drop database restriction
database-drop-empty-database.description: Can only drop the database if there's no table in it.
